data.Title: The content is not displayed in the selected interface language
data.Steps_to_reproduce: "1. Select the interface language on the site Ukrainian, 2. Scroll down the page, 3. Click on the link "ПУНКТИ САМОВИВОЗУ", 4. Pay attention to the language of the page text",
data.Actual_result: The content is displayed in Russian on the page "ПУНКТИ САМОВИВОЗУ"
data.Expected_result: The content is displayed in Ukrainian on the page "ПУНКТИ САМОВИВОЗУ"
